thread.title: Amazing stay, world class reception team
thread.title_full: Amazing stay, world class reception team - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - ExCeL, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Syed H
title: Amazing stay, world class reception team
text: Stayed here one night, I absolutely loved my stay room was clean and decent size. Modern well presented, breakfast was included which was a plus. Parking was just next to reception which is excellent when you have bags and luggage. Most importantly Sinasi and the reception team was very welcoming and looked after us well. Will recommend to friends and family.
